attributes.action: Make it law for all people to wear a helmet when on a push bike
attributes.additional_details: We need 10,000 people to sign before government take a look, please spread the word.
attributes.background:
Far too many accidents happen with people on bikes and not wearing a helmet, if this was law it would change/save so many lives. 
It’s not ‘cool’ to wear a helmet but if everyone starts doing it we can save lives and make the roads safer.
